snippet.title: BOSSGAME: The Final Boss Is My Heart - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Defeat evil bosses with all of your heart! Follow the story of curious swordswoman Sophie and excitable witch Anna, adventuring girlfriends who team up to defeat devils and earn a paycheck. BOSSGAME is all about high-speed rhythmic battles and coordinating both our heroes with both your thumbs. It’s about texting your dorky friends, charming rivals, and trashy enemies. It’s about uncovering dark secrets surrounding the downtrodden MAMMON CITY. And most of all, it’s about proving that love and stubborn optimism can topple any evil, even your boss!

Coming in 2020 for iOS, Android, PC, and Mac.
Learn more at http://www.bossgamegame.com
Get updates on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ItsMeAgentV

---

Music by RoccoW
Fonts by Chevy Ray
